Ane treatise of conscience Quhairin divers secreits concerning that subiect, are discovered, as may appeare, in the table following. Hume, Alexander, 1560?-1609.
128 p.
Printed by Robert Walde-graue printer to the Kings Maiestie, At Edinburgh : 1594.
Dedication signed: A. Hume. At foot of title: Cum privilegio Regali. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
